question: Who has been elected as the new President of Colombia?
explanation: Ivan Duque Marquez , the Conservative political newcomer, has been elected as the new President of Colombia and will assume office on August 7, 2018. He won the 2018 presidential election by 54% of the vote on June 17, 2018. His running mate, Marta Luc√≠a Ramirez, will become first female Vice-President of the country.
